short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Steam game prices from USD to TRY and checks if it was given away for free on Epic Games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts Steam game prices from USD to TRY. On the game's page, if the game was previously given away for free on Epic Games, an Epic Games icon appears next to the game's title. Both features can be enabled or disabled at any time.
